text:
e="preserve">The Academy Award for Best Picture is one of the Academy Awards. Also called Oscars, the Academy Awards are given to people working in the movie industry by the American Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS).
In the list below, the winner of the award for each year between 1927 and 1929 is shown first, followed by the other nominees.

annotations.surface_form: American Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
